(Icedemon, Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer are guarding Iron Raptor and 
Tavatron, of course, none of your characters know that)

The Oblitercons/Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Amobeous/Chordate/Ramhorn/Smokescreen:



Dark One looked to Zardus.  "Excellent.  About our contract, same amount of 
time and same pay?" he asked, nodding his head to the four other Oblitercons.

Scavenger transformed into his HUMVEE mode, two crates loaded into the back 
of vehicle mode.

Pyro transformed to his tank mode, his hatch opening, three crates loaded 
into that mode.

Dark One transformed into his jet fighter mode, a crate being loaded into his 
cockpit.

The Oblitercons left the base, talking to each other over a secure com.

<The craft we discovered won't be good enough to hide our energon.  We need 
to hide it where someone will never find it.  Where someone has no business 
being>

<Like a desert?> Breakdown suggested.

<Maybe...>

<That huge plot of ice!  Antville?> Pyro said.

<Antarctica!  Yes!  Wait...no...to unstationary.  It could melt.  We don't 
know enough about Terran history.  I do remember a place we crashed at...>

<The...Gobi Desert I believe.> Hiss, the historian, said.

<Yes!  We'll hide it there!  Follow me!> Dark One yelled, turning to the 
northeast towards the Gobi Desert, his men following him.

======

Anubis and Hades ignored Gigatron, seeing Amobeous.

---

Amobeous ran with his rifle, jumping bakc in surprise as a golden robot, 
Anubis, leapt in front of him.  A golden leg sent Amobeous' rifle out of his 
hands.  Punching, Anubis blocked and countered with a left hook, knocking 
Amobeous out.

Hades grabbed the Maximal's rifle, putting it into his subspace pocket.

Anubis looked to Gigatron.  "Carry him back to base.  He can tell us what is 
up with those blasted Maximals and their slagging space cruisers."

<It's Anubis, we have  him Master Shuko>

<Excellent!  Don't let him get away, at all costs>

========

Chordate looked to Kluster.  "Errr...sir, is it wise to let all these people 
come and stay here?  What about the Ark?  We can't leave it there for the 
Predacons to get!  Or some other sick minded fool!"

========

Smokescreen helped Ramhorn up, concern in his voice for Ramhorn, who had 
become a brother-like figure to him.  "What in the Pit happened?"

"Two Maximals knocked me down and left when they suddenly appeared in front 
of me."

"Ok...do you need a CR chamber?"

"No.  Tell Prowl though."

"He's not here, I don't think so anyways."

"What?"

"A Maximal battlecruiser crashed, and it's in good condition.  A lot of 
Maximals went out to check on it."

"Those fools!  We're going to get smashed into guacamolli!" Ramhorn yelled, 
getting up and running for the bridge, Smokescreen following from behind.
